    • Constructor Detail

      • Point4

        public Point4()
        Stand-in for a 4-place vector, where the fourth place is always 1f.

      • Point4

        public Point4(VecF3 vec)
        Stand-in for a 4-place vector, where the fourth place is always 1f.
        Parameters:
        vec - The xyz values of this point.

      • Point4

        public Point4(VecF4 v)
        Stand-in for a 4-place vector, where the fourth place is always 1f.
        Parameters:
        v - A vector of which the fourth place will be discarded and replaced by 1f.

      • Point4

        public Point4(float x,
      float y,
      float z,
      float w)
        Stand-in for a 4-place vector, where the fourth place is always 1f.
        Parameters:
        x - The x value of this point.
        y - The y value of this point.
        z - The z value of this point.
        w - This value is discarded in favour of 1f.
